Html:
Hi everyone :-)

I need some help in using PHPExcel.

I wrote an fileuploader for uploading my xlsm file on my webserver.
Now i will read the xlsm and create some charts with PHPExcel.
But it is possible to dislpay the created line graph on my website with PHPExcel?

Or are there any other solutions? Thanks for answering..

I recommend you use jqplot to create graph on your website.

http://www.jqplot.com/
It's possible to generate a jpg image directly from the graph in an OfficeOpenXML format Excel file (.xlsx) using the jpgraph library. Look at 35chartrender.php in the Examples folder
